website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for those looking for step climbers. It is compact and one of the most durable designs on the market.
pros: Small, low-profile size makes it portable, and its solid construction means it can be used by anyone
Users were impressed with how well it was made and its easy assembly
cons: Since this is a step climber only, you don't get the full body workout
A few reported they thought it was overpriced

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great little stepper. Have been using it regularly, it's very small and quiet. I had an old yoga mat i cut to fit as a base and have no fear of scratching when i use it on hardwood floor. Very adjustable in terms of intensity and work up a sweat in 10 minutes. Have been doing 45+minute sessions on it while doing online things at my standing desk. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mama Carmen

customer_reviews.title: waste less time trying to lose weight with exercise
customer_reviews.text: I love this stepper. I got it a few years ago and it served as a conversation piece. Recently, however, my dad got ill and I've had to forsake the gym. I do the high intensity intervals 20/20 8-10 a day while working--in just a couple of weeks, I've lost 4 pounds. Plus, it really works the knees and hips so going up the stairs for this big gal with a bad back is much easier now. As I find time to go back to the gym, I'll continue with this piece of equipment. Who can't find 100 seconds a few times a day for a workout, right?
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Wickman

customer_reviews.title: I'd happy pay an extra $100 for that
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality! One tiny complaint. I'm tall and I have long legs. I wish they made this in a version that had 4 more inches of stepping stride. I'd happy pay an extra $100 for that. But otherwise it's a really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: David Lind

customer_reviews.title: Best piece of workout equipment you will ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, This little thing is freaking AWESOME! Talk about a 20 second workout?! This thing will shock you on how fast your legs will BURN... you will think they are on fire... oh yeah, and the next day you will feel your stomach muscles crying out for help! ♡ I LOVE THIS STEPPER! ♡ Perfect workout for a Trucker who is health conscious like us!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H - Florida

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact stepper
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality compact stepper. Adjustable tension. The two hydraulic pistons seem to weep a bit of hydraulic fluid. At some point, I will need to add some fluid, but I travel with it and have been using it for quite some time now and I don't know what I would do without this. I would absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Searcher

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expect from a stepper
customer_reviews.text: I found the product somewhat disappointing and am returning. The product is very well made and appreciate that it is made in the US. I expected; however, that the steps would operate independently (like a regular stair stepper), but they do not. When independent, it forces you to work harder by default to keep a stepping motion. On this machine, stepping down on one side automatically forces the other side up. Xiser advertises the best exercise machine is the one you use. I don't think I would use it very much. No real criticism about its quality. It is not what one would expect from a stepper.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Don't let the small size fool u
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good piece of excerise equipment. Very heavy duty and challenging. It makes no noise and is perfect for small spaces. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: K. Ketterman

customer_reviews.title: Very cool stepper
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, functional, indestructible, very portable, aerobic and interval workouts. Keep it near my desk for quick workouts. Use it with iphone interval workout apps. Everyone in my family has tried it. Teenagers thru adults. Getting a mat is not necessary and the half inch mat I got introduced a little instability when the variable settings of the stepper is on the toughest, aerobic settings. ( the factory setting when you get it.). As recommended, I slowly progressed to less resistance for more intense workout. I haven't noticed any further instability since.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I had burned up/worn out several mini-steppers before I found this unit. I'm VERY Happy with the mini-stepper from Xiser. No squeaks, no change in resistance as I have used it. The price is high, but WOW, it is worth every dime! And no weird dust that I had with the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Three KidsTwo dogs

customer_reviews.title: Works! Really, really.
customer_reviews.text: As most people might do, I have bought several fitness equipment and gave out them to my friends, so far. This stepper is one of my best shopping items for my fitness. Quickly, it makes maximum calorie burning. First, I could do stepping on it for thirty seconds only. And now, I can do it for one minute! So I keep switching and repeating between stepping on the stepper and walking around it. I am really satisfying with this stepper. I believe that this one won't be a given out item to others, anymore. And it is really portable to move or carry to anywhere. I love this stepper.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: Description says "like a piece of wall art" ...REALLY???
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a dissapointment when I opened the box to see scratches/abrasions on the rough textured surface of this silver version Xiser. This is NOT what I expected for the high $399 pricetag. I assumed from the picture and the description that says "it's like a piece of wall art", that this would look nice in the corner of my living room. No!
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi

customer_reviews.title: The machine is still in great shape after 3 months of regular use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 3 months ago for in-home use. At the time, I was 2 months pregnant and did not have the energy for my usual HIIT cardio routine. This was a life-saver during my first trimester, when I knew I needed to move, but was low on energy. The machine is still in great shape after 3 months of regular use. I love how convenient it is to use. It is not bulky like a treadmill and I can move it with ease throughout the house. As other reviewers have noted, the machine can become quite hot after extended periods of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high quality sturdy machine that is built to last a lifetime. My only complaints are that the foot pedals are too close together ( only 2 1/4 inches) no where near shoulder width apart and the pedals are only 10 inches long. Great for a small person but harder to balance for a big person.
customer_reviews.author: D Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Home Cardio
customer_reviews.text: I love using a mini-stepper at home to exercise while watching television, but my home is very small. This is terrific because I can leave it out without it taking up too much room, and I can easily put it away when I want to. It's holding up much better than cheaper versions I've had in the past because there are no welds that can wear out. With it, I'm always in the lead with my friends on my step counts!
customer_reviews.author: K. J. Witbeck

customer_reviews.title: It's been almost a couple of months and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Although the price is pretty high, the quality and build is what you pay for. This thing can last and I'm confident I will be using this for years. With proper use this is an awesome exercise device. Portable enough to take anywhere and strong and rigid for anyone to use. I use it for tabata training and works well in my routine. Either I sprint on it by itself or I carry in my hands a couple of 15 pound dumbbells for an upper body exercise that will leave me breathless with enough push. I only recommend this for anyone who is already into or have their will ingrained to work out.
customer_reviews.author: JMarvel

customer_reviews.title: Quite a workout in a short time. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Watch some YouTube videos on how to use this. It's a workout to be sure and perfect for a person who has limited space for equipment
customer_reviews.author: R in Washington State

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I had been thinking about buying this for over a year. Finally I ordered it on Thanksgiving 2012. It was at my house in 4 days! Very easy to put together, convenient and a great work out. I was looking for an alternative to running on days when weather was bad or I got home late from work. This is a good choice. The first time I used it I surprised how tired I was after only half an hour. Very sturdy and quiet. It's small and fits nicely in a corner and stays there, no moving and setting anything up, just get on and start stepping. Thanks for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pice of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pice of equipment. Well worth the price. I use it as part of a circuit training with a total gym. Love having excessive equipment at home that do not take up space, use your own weight for resistance and no electronics to break down!
customer_reviews.author: Mike O

customer_reviews.title: My friend was surprised when he heard the price...
customer_reviews.text: Just think, if you want to get some exercise by going to gym, but in fact almost 70% people stop going to gym in the middle. You don't need to spend a time you go to gym if you put this item in your room and HIIT exercise needs just a few minutes and you can do it anytime you want. Everything will depend on whether you would be, lazybones who is suppose to quit going to gym will spend monthly gym fee or the ones who makes a good habit to keep exercising in your room by it.
customer_reviews.author: Westville

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it about a month and it is a really nice workout. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy is going to work your legs like no other .i am surprised i didn’t hear about it quicker . Great buy !
customer_reviews.author: C. Milu

customer_reviews.title: the best kept secret.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what it promises. No gimmicks no electronics, just great workout. I would recommend this to any one serious about exercising. Tough, strong, very durable. You would realize your money back in weeks first in time savings, and from expensive gym membership and the benefits to your health and body. I am 6ft @ 230lbs. Had this for two weeks I am already at 228 and now break a sweat easilly even when I am not on this little beast. Lastly know what your body can take and control your diet. No sugary drinks(even so called sports drinks and juices) drink water and cut down on the carbs.good luck with this xiser the best.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is built very well. I weight over 300 pounds and it handles me with ease.
customer_reviews.author: springr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. So easy to use and the workout is great. It is sturdy and solid. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: angia85

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Excellent piece of equipment. Quiet. It is worth the money to get quality and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Layne Brock

customer_reviews.title: 6 month review
customer_reviews.text: Is literally nearly silent, no creaking or squeeking, just a hydrolic "whisper" sound. Rock stable. Simple machinery, less to break or wear. Will last your lifetime, I'm sure. Save the planet an buy this instead of 10 cheap steppers over the next 10 years (our cheap wa-mart stepper lasted about 80 days).
customer_reviews.author: chooch

customer_reviews.title: Xciser highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Have only been using the xciser for two weeks but am very happy with the quality and how easy it was to put together! It's very well made and will obviously stand up well over time! Working out is both a time saver and challenging at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Lois A Fleener

customer_reviews.title: Great and portable exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great and portable exercise equipment! Used it together with my 17-yr. old daughter while on cross-country road trip in the motel rooms. The only reasons I did not give it 5 stars: 1) the cylinders get really hot while using it and 2) they started to squeak after about 5' once they get hot - see (1). Maybe it won't be an issue for a smaller/lighter users but I'm 6'-3" and 190# while my teen is a 6' and 160#. We both do crew as sport/exercise so it was a great tool to stay in shape while driving 350-400 miles a day for over two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: afilatov

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical that this small machine would have enough ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this small machine would have enough range of motion. It has all I want and takes little space in my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a total gym rat and recently had a baby and love this stepper!! Recent mom with not much time to drive to the gym I quickly became a huge fan of the Xiser. I've had this stepper for almost 2 months and I'm very surprised at the good workout I get. I use hand weights while on the Xiser and it's an amazing workout. I probably would have been ok with just the regular model versus the commercial but I'm hoping that the commecial model will last more as I use it everyday for 30-40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: seaturtle

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks horribly after just a few months of minimal use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 5 months, used it fairly sparingly, and it makes so many distracting squeaking and clicking noises that I can't stand to use it most of the time. Very disappointing, especially for such an expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: A Portland Native

customer_reviews.title: Xiser!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been active in fitness for the past 25 years and was looking for something relatively small/compact to bring my cardio to another level. I stumbled upon the Xiser. It seemed to be exactly what I wanted/needed but I was hesitant due to the limited number of reviews and the price. Cautiously optimistic I ordered the Xiser and after using it multiple times I couldnt have made a better decison. The Xiser is simply awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: No squeaking, feels like walking IRL
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy machine that is virtually silent. The "walking feel" is very realistic and easy on the knees even over hours of use. It isn't cheap but it is great.
customer_reviews.author: matthew johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stepper to replace my old stepper that broke. I was looking for something robust and the construction quality of this product seems to be good. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. This isn't some cheap department store product.it is made to work without prematurely breaking or falling apart. No plastic wishy washy parts. My wife and I drive long haul truck together and have been using this for two months now. I am pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Xiser
customer_reviews.text: Prior to my purchase I did a huge research about small exercise machines. When I came across XISER I read everything I could possibly read about this product, watched videos. Then I bought the product - the $400 one. It was very simple to assemble it. It is a small "machine". I can move it into any room without any problem. I can do several different exercises on it (not just stepping)- I love it. It was expensive but worth every penny. It is well built and sturdy. And what is most important - whenever I walk by it, I do few stepping exercises. It is in a use every day. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: bronichka

customer_reviews.title: Mature, mechanically inept woman's review:I assembled mine wrong at first
customer_reviews.text: So watch the instructional video at Xiser.com, it shows how to take it out of the box and set it up and although not hard to set up, I didn't place the cylinder base holes over the knob and mine was shuddering when the pistons went up and down. Customer support is awesome...I had a problem they called me back within 30 minutes or less! I'm 57 and have some knee pain, and I was worried about that but making the tension less helped with that. Also I plan on going on an anti-inflammatory diet to reduce joint pain and with losing weight with this new machine, I will be good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The fact it doesn't take a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The fact it doesn't take a great deal of space and easy to use is also great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice piece of equipment so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really liking my xciser so far!! It is portable enough to take from room to room and so easy to jump on for a quick HIIT:-)) Glad I bought it!!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Exercise
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price!!! Two of us use it at least 4 times daily. Very well made and one of the best purchases for a piece of exercise equipment...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Krazy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite exercise equipment.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day, at least 10 times per day. I no longer have to work my quads out at the gym as long as I keep using it. The stepping is as smooth as can be, unlike the cheaper ones with the hydraulic lifts that work independently of each other. The science behind using this for very short periods at high intensity is legit. Besides...I'd much rather do this for 30-45 seconds at max intensity for 10-20 times per day than commit 30 minutes to cardio all at once. I'm very glad I found this machine and plan to use it for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: CIP

customer_reviews.title: Worth the high price
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. I was looking, initially, for a cheap and easily-stored stepper to use in my recovery from breaking a few bones. But after reading about the things breaking or not working well, I figured it makes sense to go for quality. This "Xiser" is solid, well designed, and actually attractive in an industrial-chic way. The tension adjustment is straightforward, and the movement of the pedals is smooth. My heavy husband has even been using it (yeah!) with no complaint. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Criticalthinker

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best stepper, ever, hands down. Even though it is expensive, it is well worth it...very well designed. I simply set up the stepper in a doorway so I can rest my hands on the sides of the door frame--who needs handrails? You will not be disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Solid product... WOW it's a work out!
customer_reviews.text: I'm been working out all my adult life (30 years), weight lifting, hiking, biking, running. I watched the product demonstration off the vendors website, and thought to myself that doesn't look to hard. Well tonight was the first time I used the stepper. Went the entire minute. Well almost fell over at the 45 second mark. Finished, and thought I was going to buckle under my own weight. This really is an intense workout. Time will tell if the "HIT" workout is all that it is made out to be.
customer_reviews.author: J. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sturdy exercise machine
customer_reviews.text: This stepper does not take up much space, is easy to use, and always available. I set my stopwatch for 60 minutes, then use my stepper for a very quick 100 steps, then go back to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Much Better than expected. It will get the job done in about 5 minutes and space saving is a plus. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jamerson

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Oil it?
customer_reviews.text: Makes a little noice now. Do I oil the cylinders?
customer_reviews.author: BAltadonna

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: The equipment takes up little space, it gives a good workout that is adjustable. You can take it easy or tighten the tension and get an intense workout. I would recommend this product for a low-impact workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jean R

customer_reviews.title: This exerciser is the perfect size. Does exactly what is says
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review for Amazon. This exerciser is the perfect size. Does exactly what is says. Would recommend this over and elliplicle
customer_reviews.author: Monica White

customer_reviews.title: Not a good work out!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Very expensive and not very good for exercise routine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Equipment
customer_reviews.text: The Xiser is a solid piece of equipment. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gus D

customer_reviews.title: Easy and convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: In reviewing the product, I thought I would also receive the "X-iser Core 4TM Training Manual & Instructional Videos", but those weren't included. I think they are all online, but a printed training manual would have been nice to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Conry

customer_reviews.title: Greater produce detail is needed, but great stepper.
customer_reviews.text: The product package and content does not include adequate explanation of the model compared to others on sale by the company which makes it hard to decide on which to purchase. After some research I found out this is the more durable Pro Trainer. The unit is a little larger than other mini steppers I have seen. This enables a much longer stride which seems more natural to me. I don’t think I would use one of the cheaper models on the market. This is a case where you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good - hard workout
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy (I am/was 250 lb). It will wear you out. Easy on the joints...hard muscle/aerobic workout. So tough I can only do high intensity interval training on this. I alternate between 45 sec bursts on this and hopping on my elliptical. Whew!
customer_reviews.author: KAW

customer_reviews.title: Step on
customer_reviews.text: Two months in and I have no issues with this stepper. Very portable, and extremely stable. I love this stepper and I use it every day for 45 minutes a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tywanda

customer_reviews.title: the shocks that provide resistance were terrible. I am 200lbs and after limited use (less ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not thrilled with this product. I gave it two stars because it is made in the USA and because the aluminum construction is top notch. However, the shocks that provide resistance were terrible. I am 200lbs and after limited use (less than 30 workouts total) the shocks no longer provide resistance. I noticed that the ground around the shocks is stained, and even with the highest resistance setting (there is a screwhead-type adjustment), these provide no resistance. I must have blown the seals. They might work well for someone lighter in weight than me, or someone my weight that does not run very hard. For the price, though, I was disappointed in the quality of the shocks.
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super well made and a terrific tool for burst training. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Edin

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I am my 70's, have had a hip replacement, and have erythromelalgia in my feet. I purchased this to help with my RLS in the evenings when it acts up. When I watched a video on putting it together (easy) and saw the demo at the end, I was nervous about whether I would be able to use it. I can and it helps. The machine is very solid, light-weight, everything it should be.
customer_reviews.author: treehugger

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I needed a stepper to burn more fat, and get some additional cardio for my workouts. I read about this, read the reviews and ordered it. The service was prompt, and this was very easy to put together. It also will give all a very good cardio workout.Even at its easiest level,it kicks your butt.Its also built to last, very well constructed/
customer_reviews.author: rb1976

customer_reviews.title: Solid and smooth
customer_reviews.text: It is really a sturdy stepper. I really like it. It took couple of days to get the balance but now I can do the intense workout (2-3 minutes) or slow work out with more resistance too. It's also light enough to carry around the house.
customer_reviews.author: V. Bhadra

customer_reviews.title: Great well built stepper
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. Like others, I was really worried about the price. However, it is so well built and durable, I am more than satisfied. I use it everyday while I am watching the news in the morning. I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: ambrasure

customer_reviews.title: Bursting is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: A must have. I'm 67 years old and I get my cardio on! Love busrting. Doesn't take up your living place like a treadmill does!!
customer_reviews.author: Really great games.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product built well
customer_reviews.text: Love it works u heart rate quick n u feel the burn in your legs quick. Will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: john santiago

customer_reviews.title: Xiser
customer_reviews.text: The Xiser gives a good workout and stores away conveniently. It is especially great when the weather does not allow walking outside for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: Its the last stepper you'll ever need to buy. Rock solid and a good workout. I find doing sets the most helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: Product works as stated in instructional guide and videos. Really works you. Well made and easy to use. Wish it wasn't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Gale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and transport
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Easy to assemble and transport. A real burning workout for the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would LOVE it if it didn't squeak so often. Great exercising alternative for small living spaces.
customer_reviews.author: smileztam

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few weeks ago to use with my standing desk at work. Assembled easily. Works as advertised. Great way to get a bit of extra exercise during the day. I have the tension near the maximum setting and need to take short breaks after about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: NYConlinebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable stepper that really does the job
customer_reviews.text: Awesome portable stepper that really does the job! I travel a lot and needed something to burn some calories. This is heavy duty and is not breaking any time soon. I would defiantly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Santoyo

customer_reviews.title: Xiser is Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: The Xiser is everything I expected and then some. Light weight, sturdy, good resistance, quiet, brilliant design. So clever. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Exercise Device
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It requires no electricity and it travels super super easily. Highly recommend. I set it up right beside my TV and use it for 15-20 minutes a couple of times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Myers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but built like a tank. You can really get your heart rate going!
customer_reviews.author: Pacifijess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product -- well built and performs very well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for several weeks now and it is built very solid and functions very well. Not even a hint of something getting loose or breaking down. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kemal Oflazer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my small apartment to get in shape for my wedding
customer_reviews.author: Adeshewa Balogun

customer_reviews.title: Nice but pricey
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice for what it is, but it is pretty expensive. I have had it for more than a month and still have to hang on to something to balance, which means I can't do simultaneous arm exercises as the docs recommend. The docs claim that you can get an adequate amount of exercise with a minute of high intensity stepping, but I don't buy it, though I am doing it several times a day. Still, I don't regret having purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Venable

customer_reviews.title: Great little stepper
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, feels super sturdy but is still portable - I stow it in my hall closet and then pull it out to use in my living room while watching tv. Definitely glad I spne the extra money to buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: I saw the positive reviews and thought I'd try this despite the price. It only has 3 settings, the pedals are awkward, and it is clunky. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine but MUCH  less expensive elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Go to xciser website and save yourself $100. So mad at myself for not checking there first. Other than price, I do love this machine. It's a beautiful piece of equipment, very well made, and will last for years and years.
customer_reviews.author: MelRen

customer_reviews.title: I bought this through their website. I used it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this through their website. I used it for a little while but found it to be heavy, and awkward I was looking for a stepper not a burster. I really do not not think it is worth the money. Oh and that thing that sits in the middle constantly falls over before I even start. I don't think it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: just arrived
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine. Can anyone tell me how you tell the commercial one apart from the standard one? The pictures look identical... Review will follow when I've had a chance to use it...the 3 stars are just temporary...
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is lasting for a long time. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Buening

customer_reviews.title: Xiser Commercial Portable Stepper
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid, simple, indestructible. My kids use it, too! Small enough to go anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: JStafford

product_meta.title: Xiser Commercial Mini Stairmaster, Polished Alloy
feature_bullets: Five Year Consumer Warranty, One year institutional warranty
Cast Airframe Grade Alloy, Weighs only 14 lbs, Withstands weight in excess of 400 lbs
Patented Hydraulic Cylinder System, Adjustable resistance, NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED
Responds to your effort and ability, Silicone fluid for smooth & quiet operation
The worlds first stepping machine and only step sprint trainer 100% Made in USA (Parts and Labor) since 1977
